roleset.name: make rise by adding leaven, permeate with something to cause a change
roleset.note: LEAVEN-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from leaven.01-v)

role.descr: baker, agent adding leaven or other ingredient
bread, thing receiving leaven or being permeated
leaven itself, type of leaven, thing added to permeate

example.name: Permeate, metaphorical leavening
example.text: But she leavened her scolding with humor and self-deprecation.

example.name: Leavening bread
example.text: She leavened them with beef marrow, and they were light as feathers.
